lexUnit.name: cannabis.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a dried preparation or resinous extract made from a plant, used (generally illegally) as a psychotropic drug (chiefly in cigarettes)

sentence.text: Discharged in 1988 he returned to his old job but was soon arrested for possessing cannabis .
